title: Grand Palais Chicha Lounge
overview: Ouarda's hookah bar, Le Grand Palais, is threatened with closure due to the gentrification of the neighborhood. Jassim, a new recruit from a real estate developer firm, is responsible for buying the place. At all costs. Natural enemies, Ouarda and Jassim will nevertheless become closer and fall in love, despite themselves. But is their relationship possible when the success of one depends on the failure of the other? Without forgetting the young and handsome Treizor, Ouarda's occasional lover, who talentedly hosts the bar's evenings.
